sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Interagency Children's Behavioral Health Services Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Interagency Children's Behavioral Health Services Act.

sections.heading: Children's Behavioral Health Transformation Initiative
sections.text: This Act establishes a Children's Behavioral Health Transformation Officer. The Officer shall lead the State's comprehensive, interagency effort to ensure that youth with significant and complex behavioral health needs receive appropriate commu

sections.heading: Personal support workers. The Children's Behavioral Health Transformation Team in collaboration with the Department of Human Services shall develop a program to provide one-on-one in-home respite behavioral health aids to youth requiring intensive supervision due to behavioral health needs
sections.text: Personal support workers. The Children's Behavioral Health Transformation Team in collaboration with the Department of Human Services shall develop a program to provide one-on-one in-home respite behavioral health aids to youth requiring intensive supervision due to behavioral health needs.

sections.heading: Interagency agreement. In order to establish the Interagency Children's Behavioral Health Services Team, within 90 days after the effective date of this Act, the Department of Children of Family Services, the Department of Human Services, the Department of Healthcare and Family Services, the Illinoi
sections.text: Interagency agreement. In order to establish the Interagency Children's Behavioral Health Services Team, within 90 days after the effective date of this Act, the Department of Children of Family Services, the Department of Human Services, the Department of Healthcare and Family Services, the Illinois State Board of Education, the Department of Juvenile Justice, and the Department of Public Health shall enter into an interagency agreement for the purpose of establishing the roles and responsibilities of each participating agency.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
